channel.title: Documentation on Bordeaux-Threads
channel.description: Recent content in Documentation on Bordeaux-Threads

item.title: Class THREAD
item.description: Class precedence list: thread, t Description A wrapper for host thread instances.

item.title: Function THREAD-NAME, THREAD-NATIVE-THREAD
item.description: Syntax: thread-name thread => name thread-native-thread thread => native-thread Arguments and values: thread -> an instance of class thread. name -> a string or nil native-thread -> a host thread instance. Description: These accessors return the public slots of class thread. Exceptional situations: None.

item.title: Function: THREADP
item.description: Syntax: threadp object => generalized-boolean Arguments and values: object -> an object. generalized-boolean -> a generalized boolean. Description: Returns true if object is of type thread, otherwise false. Exceptional situations: None. Notes: (threadp object) == (typep object 'thread)

item.title: Function: MAKE-THREAD
item.description: Syntax: make-thread function &key name initial-bindings handle-conditions => thread Arguments and values: function -> a function designator name -> a string or nil. initial-bindings -> an alist mapping special variable names to values. Defaults to *default-special-bindings*. handle-conditions -> if true, wrap the thread function in a handler-case. Description: Creates and returns a thread named name, which will call the function function with no arguments: when function returns, the thread terminates.
